Important

Applications running in a Desktop environment have access to your Private Space data under the /home/<HIP_USER>/nextcloud directory. Any data and/or configuration file outside of this directory will be lost when the application or desktop are closed. This is the only persistent directory as it is tied to the HIP userâ€™s Private Space at application startup. Make sure you are always working within the /home/<HIP_USER>/nextcloud directory when using applications.
